ne20:4.1: Arakkhitena cittenati kim desayati, pamadam tam maccuno padam.
ne20:4.2: Micchaditthihatena cati micchaditthihatam nama vuccati yada “anicce niccan”ti passati, so vipallaso.
ne20:4.8: Catusu attabhavavatthusu, rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
ne20:4.12: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam, attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
ne20:5.3: Sanna sankhara ca tatiyam vipallasavatthu “anattani atta”ti.
ne20:5.7: Tanhanivutam cittam dvihi vipallasehi vipallasiyati “asubhe subhan”ti “dukkhe sukhan”ti.
ne20:5.8: Ditthinivutam cittam dvihi vipallasehi vipallasiyati “anicce niccan”ti “anattani atta”ti.
ne20:6.1: Tattha yo ditthivipallaso, so atitam rupam attato samanupassati,
ne20:6.6: Tattha yo tanhavipallaso, so anagatam rupam abhinandati,
ne20:6.14: Tesam avijjanivarananam tanhasamyojananam pubba koti na pannayati sandhavantanam samsarantanam sakim nirayam sakim tiracchanayonim sakim pettivisayam sakim asurakayam sakim deve sakim manusse.
ne20:7.2: Thinam nama ya cittassa akallata akammaniyata;
ne20:7.4: Vasam marassa gacchatiti kilesamarassa ca sattamarassa ca vasam gacchati, so hi nivuto samsarabhimukho hoti.
ne20:7.5: Imani bhagavata dve saccani desitani dukkham samudayo ca.
ne20:7.6: Tesam bhagava parinnaya ca pahanaya ca dhammam deseti dukkhassa parinnaya samudayassa pahanaya.
ne20:7.7: Yena ca parijanati yena ca pajahati, ayam maggo.
ne20:7.8: Yam tanhaya avijjaya ca pahanam, ayam nirodho.
